Ah I see, okay! 
So now with VS2015 I get this error:
```
ClCompile:
  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\bin\amd64\CL.exe /c /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\build /IC:\Users\a\Documents\
  pytorch\pytorch\pytorch /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\third_party\protobuf\src /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\cmake\..\third_party\benchmark\include /IC:\Users\a\Documents\py
  torch\pytorch\pytorch\third_party\onnx /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\build\third_party\onnx /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\c10\.. /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytor
  ch\mkl\include /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\cmake\..\third_party\googletest\googletest\include /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\cmake\..\third_party\eigen /IC:\Users\a\Documen
  ts\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\cmake\..\third_party\pybind11\include /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\cmake\..\third_party\cub /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\magma\include /IC:\User
  s\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\third_party\googletest\googletest\include /IC:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\third_party\googletest\googletest /nologo /W1 /WX- /MP /O2 /Ob2 /D NDEBUG /D CUD
  A_HAS_FP16=1 /D USE_GCC_GET_CPUID /D USE_AVX /D USE_AVX2 /D TH_HAVE_THREAD /D TH_BLAS_MKL /D _OPENMP_NOFORCE_MANIFEST /D ONNX_NAMESPACE=onnx_torch /D _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE=1 /D MAGMA_V2 /D USE_MSC_ATOMICS
  =1 /D "CMAKE_INTDIR=\"Release\"" /D _MBCS /Gm- /EHa /MD /GS /fp:precise /Zc:wchar_t /Zc:forScope /Zc:inline /openmp /Fo"c10_TypeTraits_test.dir\Release\\" /Fd"c10_TypeTraits_test.dir\Release\vc140.pdb" /Gd /
  TP /errorReport:queue  /bigobj /bigobj C:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\c10\test\util\TypeTraits_test.cpp
  TypeTraits_test.cpp

_TypeTraits_test.vcxproj]
  C:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\c10/util/TypeTraits.h(23): note: see reference to class template instantiation 'std::hash<T>' being compiled
          with
          [
              T=`anonymous-namespace'::test_is_hashable::NotHashable
          ]

```

And then after some more output:

```
"C:\Users\a\Documents\pytorch\pytorch\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->

cxproj]

10_TypeTraits_test.vcxproj]
